content: Write a song in four lines with a chorus.

(Verse 1)  
In the morning light, we chase our dreams so high,  
With every step we take, we touch the sky.  
Through the darkest nights, we'll find our way,  
Together we rise, come what may.

(Chorus)  
Oh, we'll sing, we'll dance, under the moon's embrace,  
With hearts wide open, we'll find our place.  
In this world so vast, we'll never be alone,  
For in each other's arms, we've found our home.
